For all of you who don't understand:
1. Run the keygen, select version, generate. 
2. WRITE DOWN THE CODE, as you can't copy it.
3. Run Anytime Upgrade.
4. Paste code, and click 'Next'.
5. Agree to License terms.
6. DO NOT CLICK UPGRADE. Instead, close Anytime Upgrade, and restart.
7. The computer will upgrade by itself. Enjoy!

I've tried restarting both BEFORE and AFTER selecting "Upgrade" and neither times does it start to Upgrade. Not sure what I'm doing wrong? Can anyone please provide a step-by-step guide?

I'm running Win 7 Starter on HP Mini.

UPDATE!

It's installing Windows 7 Professional right now!

This is what I did:
1. Type in the keys (DO NOT COPY AND PASTE, IT WILL NOT WORK)
2. Let it verify the key (could take a while)
3. Once it verifies the key, accept the terms.
4. Some have said to NOT click Upgrade and just restart. But that hasn't worked for me. I clicked Upgrade and re-started RIGHT AWAY. Do not exit the Upgrade window. Just go to Start > Restart. 
5. Hopefully when your PC restarts, it says "Upgrading Windows" and you should have the your new OS on the bottom of the blue loading screen. (Mine used to say "Windows 7 Home" and now it says "Windows 7 Professional"). 

Hope that helps! Good luck!
